data.title: Blade Runner 2: The Edge of Human by Jeter, K. W.: Near Fine Hardcover 1st Edition, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Easton Press, Norwalk, Connecticut, ( 1995 ). - Condition: Near Fine - First edition, signed by author. Deckard returns in this sequel to the movie. Hardcover, full leather binding, all edges gilt, raised bands on spine, gilt decorations on spine and both covers. Introduction by James Gunn and color frontispiece by Pat Morrissey. Near fine. - Blade Runner 2: The Edge of Human
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

We accept checks, money orders, VISA, Mastercard, and Discover.

Shipping is $3.50 for book rate, please inquire for priority mail rates. Shipping for additional books is $1.50 each.

None of our online books are at the store, if you have any questions, please e-mail Mary Wilson at

drkstrys@aol.com.

Dark Star Books

237 Xenia Ave.

Yellow Springs, Ohio 45387

937-767-9400

fax: 937-767-7926

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
